list_definition.definition: any plan showing how money is to be spent

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The government has cut the budget for education.

list_definition.definition: to make a plan showing this

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We must try to budget or we shall be in debt.

list_definition.definition: (with for) to allow for (something) in a budget

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I hadn’t budgeted for a new car.
